title: Colonial beef curry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1 onion, finely sliced', '800g (1lb 12oz) lean chuck steak, cut into 4cm (1½ in) cubes, fat removed', '2-3 tablespoons plain flour', 'Salt', '2 tablespoons mild curry powder', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '600ml (1 pint) beef stock', '2 bay leaves', '1 heaped tablespoon sultanas or raisins', 'Juice of 1 lime']
